channel.title: Dropping
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to stop the tab from changing then you've right-clicked on an item to drop it or whatever else is on the right-click?
When I right click an item in the last 8 spaces, the drop down is large enough for drop to hang over another tab, so when I click to do that action, the tab changes. This happens with all right-clicks that hang over a tab.

item.title: Dropping
